messages.subject: hurricanes...was conference
messages.msgSnippet: So, Ren, how much rain y all expecting there in the next 24 hrs?  I ve seen the hurricane news and thought of you, tho I really don t know where Pensacola is.
messages.messageBody:
"So, Ren, how much rain y'all expecting there in the next 24 hrs? I've seen the
hurricane news and thought of you, tho I really don't know where Pensacola is. "

Absolutely none.:)
The hurricane that is affecting our southern neighbors so severely, has made our lives more pleasant. It's pulled a cold front down, and we made a record low of 66 degrees last night. The high today was 83 degrees with LOW humidity...unheard of in mid-August. I just came home from work and it felt like OCTOBER out there. Totally awesome. I just wish it didn't come at such a high price for others. We'll get our turn eventually.....

Ren
